data.name: Flag Defense
data.detailed_description:
Participate in an action loaded platformer real-time strategy game. Build yourself a superior base and be prescient about the enemy's next move.

Never was the boredom of the digital age so bad. To entertain the souls, a war cult had been formed, the so named 'Red vs. Blue' war. The battle currently takes place in one arena. You protect a flag, so does your enemy. It has no real value, but it should be irreplaceable for you, so be careful that the opponent doesn't knock it down! To prevent this, you build yourself a base consisting of cheap wood, until you end up with durable metal. Of course, you want to win, so you have a number of different weapons at your disposal. From light artillery to devastating missiles. If you want to play around with the unique building system or if you want to try out every weapon, the sandbox mode is the best fit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K Processor or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of VRAM or more.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
